column1:
Amount of Late Payment
Fee and method of
calculation.
column2:
As provided by EDC tariff where applicable, and for charges invoiced
directly by NextEra Energy, if any, 1.5\% per month during period past
due amounts remain unpaid. See section entitled "Billing and Fees" in
the TOS.

After the Initial Term expires, the Agreement continues on a month-to-
month basis and Customer will pay the Holdover Price. See section
entitled "Term of Agreement" in the TOS.
